name: backend
description: Berkeleytime backend v3, written in Node.js

scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev nodemon --exec 'prettier --write --config prettier.config.cjs --loglevel warn *.json src/*.{js,mjs} src/**/*.{js,mjs} && node --experimental-json-modules src/index.js' server client prettier.config.cjs
scripts.build: mkdir build; rollup src/index.js -c rollup.config.js | terser --compress --mangle -o build/index.js
